formatted_address: 3 Soon Lee St, #01-44 Pioneer Junction, Singapore 627606
name: HardwareCity Pioneer Junction

reviews.text:
Highly recommended and my to go shop for any hardware tools.
This shop has whatever tools u need. Parking was easy . Most of all I like the customer service .
They were incredibly helpful and make time to personally attend to all my questions and went above and beyond to ensure the product I want is to my need. I was satisfied with their top customer service.

Recently, I bought a M10 touch light from Soon Lee but accidentally bought a non-rechargeable one. Then, I went there for a replacement to a rechargeable one, but the shop in charge refused to return the items. Additionally, the price at this store is quite higher compared to others.

A few days ago, I bought an electric drill machine from there too. Initially, they quoted one price for the product, but when I mentioned I was looking for a cheaper option, they reduced the price from $150 to $100, which is terrible because if I hadn't informed them, they wouldn't have reduced a single cent. I highly recommend not going there.

There are plenty of other stores where you can get your items. Moreover, the behaviours of the shop in charge is unacceptable. Thank you.
Best place to be when a Zombie apocalypse breaks out. All types of tools to engineer your own survival items and protect your family!

Becareful buying stuff here especially boots , the team will happily promoting the item. Bought a safety boots over here ,seller keep promoting the boots and after purchase only knew its woman boots, and the shop manager is quite rude when i return to the shop to request for refund ,there is no customer service at all and only got shout back "you try yourself and paid , woman shoes can fit man one , take it or leave it we can't refund !!" Well why dont man wear bra ? Oh come on ... But the other shop sales is quite ok explain politely and exchange to other item with discount price..

So jus take note no refundable only exchangeable , see clearly before u buy at this shop,  ans ahop manager is quite rude ,thanks to the side people

Please do improvement for your staffs (Soon Lee brunch). Don't know which staff in charge whatsapp reply . Order item in advance the goods have arrived earlier in shop but never inform client. Just let client wait and wait. Until my colleague walk in the shop saw the goods already there. But at that time I still didn't receive any notification that the goods were ready for pick up!
Terrible service!!!

vicinity: 3 Soon Lee Street, #01-44 Pioneer Junction, Singapore
